title: Implement SQLite migration system and USDA FoodData Central import
description: WIP: Migration system complete, USDA schema defined, CSV importer started. Next: complete import testing with actual data.
close_reason: SQLite migration system and USDA import fully implemented and tested. Added comprehensive test suite for USDA CSV parsing (nutrients, foods, food_nutrients), import_from_directory end-to-end, and real migration tests using project files. All 178 Gleam tests and Go tests pass.
